process.name: Code Stage Tester
process.narrative: A set of tests for code stages

stage.name: new
stage.narrative:
Clean Up Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some finalisation (or "cleanup") tasks as your business object is closed down.
The cleanup action will be called automatically immediately after closing your business object at the end of a business process.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than before the disposal of the business object.

stage.name: new
stage.narrative:
Initialise Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some initialisation tasks after your business object is loaded.
The initialise action will be called automatically immediately after loading your business object.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than after the creation of the object.

stage.name: DBNull String to SingleRowTable
stage.code: Table = New System.Data.DataTable() Table.Columns.Add("StringValue", GetType(String)) ' Table.Rows.Add("Test One") Table.Rows.Add(DBNull.Value)

exception.detail: "Failed to output DBNull for a string value"
"Failed to output Null for a string value"

stage.name: Empty?
stage.narrative: Note that MakeDateTime will error if you try and give it a year of 0001

exception.detail: "Failed to output Null for a datetime value"

stage.name: Empty?
stage.narrative: Not ugly hack to test password against text - it's not a real test since 'converting' it in to text is really testing that converting a null password works as expected, not that a null password is equivalent to an empty password

exception.detail: "Failed to output Null for a password value"

stage.name: Empty?
stage.narrative: Note that MakeDateTime will error if you try and give it a year of 0001

exception.detail: "Failed to output Null for an image value"

stage.name: Oops
stage.narrative: Can't test for an empty image. At all

decision.expression: ExceptionDetail() = "Cannot perform = operation when the left-hand value is empty"

stage.name: Empty?
stage.narrative: Note that MakeDateTime will error if you try and give it a year of 0001

exception.detail: "Failed to output Null for a binary value"

stage.name: Oops
stage.narrative: Can't test for an empty binary. At all

decision.expression: ExceptionDetail() = "Cannot perform = operation when the left-hand value is empty"

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative: Oddly, you can compare empty binary data items, but you can't compare empty image data items... seems a bit incongruous but there you go...

stage.name: Empty?
stage.narrative: Note that MakeDateTime will error if you try and give it a year of 0001

exception.detail: "Failed to output Null for a timespan value"

stage.name: Get Names
stage.code:
dim t as new System.Data.DataTable dim r as System.Data.DataRow
t.columns.add("name", System.Type.GetType("System.String")) t.columns.add("dob", System.Type.GetType("System.DateTime"))
r = t.NewRow() r(0) = "tom" r(1) = Microsoft.VisualBasic.Now() t.Rows.Add(r)
r = t.NewRow() r(0) = System.DBNull.Value r(1) = Microsoft.VisualBasic.Now() t.Rows.Add(r)
r = t.NewRow() r(0) = "harry" r(1) = System.DBNull.Value t.Rows.Add(r)
names = t

stage.name: DBNull String to SimpleTable
stage.code: Table = New System.Data.DataTable() Table.Columns.Add("StringValue", GetType(String)) Table.Rows.Add(DBNull.Value)

exception.detail: "Failed to output DBNull for a string value"

decision.expression: InStr(ExceptionDetail(), "String was not recognized as a valid DateTime") > 0

stage.name: Oops
stage.narrative: Can't test for an empty datetime. At all

decision.expression: ExceptionDetail() = "Cannot perform = operation when the left-hand value is empty"

stage.name: Set Bad Collection
stage.code:
MyColl = New DataTable()
' The target stage has 'Field1' and 'Field3' MyColl.Columns.Add("Field1", GetType(String)) MyColl.Columns.Add("Field2", GetType(Integer))
MyColl.Rows.Add(New Object() {"Value 1", 1}) MyColl.Rows.Add(New Object() {"Value 2", 2})

exception.detail: "The code stage output (Field1,Field2) to a collection (Field1,Field3) successfully. It should not have"
